title: Personality Isn't Permanent: Book Review
itunes:title: Personality Isn't Permanent: Book Review
description:
Today I talk with one of my coaches about the book Personality Isn't Permanent by Benjamin Hardy, PhD.

I highly recommend this book for everyone to read. It teaches you how you don't have to continue to be the person you are today. You can create the person you want to be, including a person who has lost her weight and lives the life of a thin person.

To purchase the book and see my other book recommendations, you can click here.

 

Get the Free Course here:
